title: Product Formulation Landscape Intelligence
description: A synthesized and normalized dataset defining the formulation strategies, ingredient integrity, and competitive vulnerabilities in the glucose control supplement market.

marketSummary.description: A high-level strategic summary of the formulation landscape.

thesis.description: The core strategic thesis explaining the dynamics of product formulation in this market.

keyFindings.description: The most critical, high-level takeaways from the analysis.

ingredientAnalysis.description: A forensic breakdown of the key ingredients used across the market.

ingredientTier.description: Classification of the ingredient's strategic role.

doseReality.description: A summary of how this ingredient is actually dosed by competitors versus the clinically effective range.

strategicLandscape.description: An analysis of the overarching formulation strategies and market vulnerabilities.

formulationPhilosophies.description: The distinct strategic clusters or approaches to product formulation.

keyVulnerabilities.description: Market-wide weaknesses that create strategic opportunities.

competitorMatrix.description: A normalized, at-a-glance comparison of each competitor's formulation strategy and integrity.

ingredientIntegrityScore.description: A 1-5 score of how well the formulation's dosages align with clinical evidence (1=Poor, 5=Excellent).

hasPatentedMoat.description: True if the formula relies on patented/branded ingredients.
